about_the_game:
Dungeon Riddle is 3D arcade game with puzzles and mysteries in walk simulator genre.
In this game, you find yourself in a dungeon where you need to look for keys and potions to move on.
But there is one problem here - traps. They can be anywhere, and if you step on one of them, you'll have to start over.

A dilapidated basement and piles of traps and locked doors. A great combination.
And who used to live here? A psychopathic magician with an adventurer's mania? An alchemist with a penchant for deadly traps? Or just someone who wanted to protect his treasure at all costs?

Be careful! Don't stumble over the bodies of those who were here before you!
There are many rooms in the dungeon, and each of them can be dangerous.
In one room there may be a key that opens the door to the next room, and in another there may be a solvent potion in order to clear the passage further.

Good luck to you, and don't fall into the pit!

name: Dungeon Riddle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K (4 * 3400) or equivalent / AMD FX-8350 (4 * 4000) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 (4 GB)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
